caption:
Welcome to WME, @hideo_kojima!
———
The video game legend and mastermind behind “Death Stranding” and “Metal Gear Solid” is expanding his reach beyond the gaming world. 

On why he decided to sign with WME: “Well, there are many big agencies out there. I’ve met many people over the years, but it’s important to me that I work with people who understand games and understand me. WME created a whole team for me, and they understand me the most. I feel a lot of love from them.”
